SELECT goods.*, f.file_url AS goodsImages FROM sys_goods goods LEFT JOIN sys_file f ON goods.id = f.biz_id AND 'goods' = f.biz_type
AND goods.goods_name LIKE concat('%', concat(#{goodsName}, '%'))
AND goods.goods_desc LIKE concat('%', concat(#{goodsDesc}, '%'))
AND goods.goods_type_code = #{goodsTypeCode}
ORDER BY goods.created_date DESC
